website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Squeezebox is an excellent digital-music device that offers good sound quality and a great variety of source options, but it's not for casual users.
pros: The Logitech Squeezebox Touch is a fully featured music-streaming device with wide file compatibility -- better than Sonos -- and support for most popular music-streaming services
The Touch seamlessly blends multiple home and online sources, making building playlists a snap
The free tablet and smartphone apps are powerful and easy to use
Sound quality is surprisingly good from the analog outs, and will scale well with outboard digital converters
cons: The device can sometimes freeze up or suffer lag, especially with a wireless connection
It's more complicated to use than the plug-and-play Sonos
The app is a little ugly compared with those made by Spotify and Sonos
The touch screen is less useful in conjuction with a tablet
Most users will need to leave a PC on all the time, or own a NAS

customer_reviews.title: I realize this product is possibly 'past technology', but ...
customer_reviews.text: I realize this product is possibly 'past technology', but it is what I need to bring my stereo system and my digitized collection of music into harmony. Play lists are limit to 100 songs. Set up is not overly intuitive nor quick. I am still on the learning curve to maximize the capabilities of this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had a Roku Music Bridge. It promised to stream Internet music AND access the music files on my computer. It was a failure. Now, in 2011, Logitech has nailed this concept. Seamless, comprehensive access to unlimited Internet streaming sources PLUS total access to music stored on my computer via the Logitech music server that comes free with this device. Easy access and a high-quality DAC (digital-audio converter) make this a top-of-the-line product. But wait, there's more: If you have an android phone or tablet, download Squeeze Commander for $4.99 and get total remote access to the Squeezebox (including volume control) from your phone! This is icing on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Simmer

customer_reviews.title: Great device for a Computer Audiophile, but apple is better!
customer_reviews.text: The Touch is a good place to start if you are assembling a computer based listening system. The sound is great. It is a nice companion for a ripping nas and a good stereo. For someone experienced in computers that wants to take the time to develop a system for organizing a digital music library this combination will make a great hobby. The product support people at Logitech are excellent and the online documentation and community forums are helpful if you find yourself coming up against sticking points. (Much later) I've since gone with the apple express, remote and mini iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall AC50 Stack

customer_reviews.title: The best device
customer_reviews.text: One of the best devices produced by Logitech in the squeezebox series. Still have mine in box with original remote.
customer_reviews.author: Darko

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go to device for my stereo. I have ripped all my music into lossless audio and stream it through my home stereo. It will also play 24bit 96k files from HD Tracks and they sound spectacular considering the price of this little wonder. The only drawback is every once in a while the unit will reboot itself and you have to wait till it turns back on but other than that its top notch. You will also love the streaming radio stations as well as Pandora and Spotify among other apps you can download from logitech. Great product logitech!
customer_reviews.author: lostintheamazon

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite electronics purchase in the last ten years
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've got a 16 GB flash drive loaded with all of my favorite rock music plugged into this bad boy, and another one with classical and other music available, but what I'm really enjoying is listening to new music on it with my Rhapsody subscription and listening to countless internet radio stations. I'm using this with audiofile type equipment, and the sound quality is pretty darn good. The remote control is icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: David Fussell

customer_reviews.title: Glad i found this before spending money for sonos
customer_reviews.text: While searching for an audio media device, the Squeezebox was recommended to me as a cheaper alternative to the sonos players. I found the squeezeplay app for my computer to give it a test run before purchase and it was fantastic. I've now got the squeezeserver running, squeezebox touch and largely control it all from my android tablet with the awesome app. Piping music through my whole house audio system is great. Over 30k titles in my music library plus all the internet stations I never had available before. Something is always playing at my place now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but no longer available
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device with fantastic sound quality and great functionality. Unfortunately, Logitech decided not to offer it or anything like it any longer. There is a great hole in the market for a good quality, reasonably priced, wireless digital connection between your computer and your stereo. Internet radios with their own speakers don't have the quality of a real stereo. I hope some company realizes what Logitech didn't and markets a nice unit based on the function of the Squeezebox Touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lehmanhill

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Wi-Fi Music Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost 6 months now and wonder how I survived before. I listen to all my streaming music from Rhapsody and Pandora through my home theater set-up in the family room and it sounds great! It is extremely easy to set-up, and I have only experienced a few glitches over the 6 months, nothing a re-boot or a little patience couldn't fix. I highly recommend the product to anyone who wants to listen to radio or stream music from the internet or from a computer on your network, the wi-fi aspects of this machine eliminates the need for a wifi capable receiver. Affordable price and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jkt56

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to the community to keeping it alive
customer_reviews.text: a great and nearly unique product on the product at this price. Easy to use, allows you to use a smartphone or tablet as remote control The quality of sound is connected on an amplifier is CD quality. too bad it's discontinued
customer_reviews.author: dficorsica

customer_reviews.title: No more CDs
customer_reviews.text: My original music collection was taped on reel-to-reel from records or off the radio. Years ago, I copied it all to cassette tape, and bought more recordings on cassette. Later, I digitized those to CDs, and bought more recordings on CD. And now I can finally feel comfortable getting rid of all my CDs (and CD players and CD storage units!). This device effortlessly plays all that music, now ripped to hard drive (actually, on NAS). I can play an album or, just as easily, randomly play selections from within a genre. I'm a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: reading fool

customer_reviews.title: Logitech, what have you done???
customer_reviews.text: I wake up every day to this playing through my mid-hi-end stereo. It has oppened my life up to internet radio of local and distant stations, Android control and hi-res music downloads (96k/24 but I think it goes higher), and it is fabulous. I'm VERY sad Logitech couldn't figure out a way to keep selling this product, but I don't think I would have afforded a Squeezebox this good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Tufnel

customer_reviews.title: Logitech please bring them back!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to join the hordes that demand Logitech to put this back on the market, I have two and can't live without them. I bought them way before Spotify came out, yet I could add an applet and listen to my playlists through them, just love these!! None of the actual options like the Sonos is or either self-standing or cost effective as my beloved Squeezboxes
customer_reviews.author: Chilean Ale

customer_reviews.title: great when it works
customer_reviews.text: after owning the touch for over a year I found that when it works it's great-no more fiddling with cd's-just set my favorites and play. Unfortunately, many times your ready for some tunes and the logitech touch has reprogramed itself-lost your favorites list-needs to go through a 10 minute reboot-or just won't play. It makes a nice clock for your shelf though since it does seem to manage to always find the time. Many times you only learn of the flawed products by making a purchase. Hope you have better luck if you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: goodorbad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product for Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just got my touch and it's fantastic. I'm amazed at the level of sound quality. When I do an A/B test against my $600 CD player it is very difficult to tell any difference in sound quality (disclosure - I added a linear power supply and have high-end interconnects). I previously owned a Squeezebox 3 and I am stunned at how much better the sound is from the Touch. If you are thinking of upgrading to improve sound quality go ahead and pull the trigger - you want be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Cville

customer_reviews.title: LT Squeezebox Touch Rocks!  Love it
customer_reviews.text: This brings your home music network to a whole new meaning! Awesome. I have it tied into my stereo system. This replaced another means of playing Pandora, which had a terrible wireless connection. The connection on the touch is fabulous! Because the quality is so good my wireless headphones sound like they are wired in. I may have to put another Logitech system in my bedroom eventually thats tied into the network. Although I may not need it. Will have to experiment with the alarm functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Streaming music with ease
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to enjoy your music anywhere in your house. I ripped all of my CDs to my home computer's hard drive in lossless FLAC format using dBpoweramp. Now I can hook up the Touch to my main stereo in my living room wirelessly or to my home theater receiver via wired ethernet and stream my music without having to dig out a CD. It also allows you to stream music from Internet radio stations with ease. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Krondo_jd

customer_reviews.title: This One Works
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a couple other internet radio devices, and they were difficult to set-up, or otherwise ineffective. The Squeezebox Touch is the way to go. I didn't even open the manual, and I'm no computer geek. Making connection with my WiFi network was a two minute affair, and I found all the stations I was looking for in a few minutes. Pandora and all work perfectly. It's expensive, but i'll only cry once.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Two years and still running strong on my stereo system.  Easy to access internet stations. Much more  not taken advantage of
customer_reviews.text: I paid less but given its value I would pay more. Small but has a great construction and screen. And versatility. A good used one might be a reasonable purchase even now.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Very Happy with It
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Squeezebox Touch for a month now, and very happy with the purchase. My whole family loves the ability to 1) listen to crystal-clear internet radio broadcast from all over the world (many of them completely commercial-free); 2) search songs on Rhapsody via Squeezebox and play it right away; 3) play Pandora on Squeezebox; and 4) ability to control Squeezebox (including volume) from any computer in the house. Well-engineered, easy-to-use, and reliable. Highly recommended. I have my Squeezebox hooked to Studiophile speakers (, which sound great and highly recommend for their amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeezbox Touch
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best device of its kind around. It has definitely brought the world of audio entertainment to whole new level. We've had it for about 9 months with absolutely no problems. Music, news, talk, sports from all over the place and I'm sure that Squeezebox/Logitech will add more apps as time goes on. Wouldn't/couldn't be without it. 5 big stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bobmar

customer_reviews.title: It's a game changer
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the ease of set up and how well it does what it says it does. Got the Logitech App on my itouch and it works great as well. Just got it all set up last night, took my a couple hours, but that is with distractions from Thanksgiving, etc. My head is spinning with thoughts of what I can do with this thing now...might get another one for the garage...once you get something like this, the regular radion (or iPod on a dock) just doesn't cut it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Calls

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox Touch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Logitech Squeezebox Touch from amazon.com and received the product in few days.I have to return the first unit made by Grace because the text on display showing upside down. I decided to order Squeezebox Touch instead. I have this unit for about two weeks. The unit so easy to use even my wife with little computer knowledge using it constantly. In few meninges I was able to save the radio stations to my favorites. Lots of useful features. few times I sent email to Logitech's Technical support and I receive they respond in one day. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Device!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a top of the line internet radio this is it! This little guy does it all. World radio, streaming from your computer, streaming from services like spotify and pandora. Optical audio to go straight to your receiver. Connect this through ethernet or wireless to your home network. Control the squeezebox with your mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: vohnvest

customer_reviews.title: Nice Touch
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very pleased with the SB Touch. What I like the best is the sound quality, followed by the feature set. On the downside is the Logitech software... it's not quite bug free, but usually a simple unplugging and restarting resolves any problem. I would highly recommend this product for someone wanting to get better sound from their computer.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F. Ormerod

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox Products Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I love Squeezebox products. I'm REALLY disappointed that Logitech purchased Squeezebox & shortly thereafter discontinued the entire product line.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Best of all the Wi-fi's
customer_reviews.text: I own three Squeeze box Touch Radios, one Squeezebox Boom and a Squeezebox Bedside radio. These have replaced other wi-fi radios throughout our house, and other than the odd bit of quirkiness, they are all terrific. I had occasion to contact Logitech customer service a couple of times. They were responsive and helpful. Problem solved quickly. Sometimes the "touch" radios turn themselves off right after being turned on, but once being turned on again they work fine. When the radios have to be re-booted, it is a quick process (some other brands take forever and require re-entering the network password) Also, accessing stations is a breeze. All in all highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Michael Kornfeld

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic product, but you need to be tweaker to really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.text: This will be short. I love the the Squeezebox Touch. It's EXACTLY what I've been looking for in a streaming music system. Having said that, you better be a bit of a computer geek to really appreciate what's here to set it up properly. If you're looking for a truly turnkey, plug and play system, go for a Sonos system. I wanted to save some bucks and took a chance with the Touch. So far, I love it and it has been working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: OlderAndWiser

customer_reviews.title: Superior Choice Over Apple and Other Competitors
customer_reviews.text: I looked for quite a while to find a streaming device with the combination of high quality sound capability and support for a diverse array of file formats. I have music files in Microsoft formats, open formats like FLAC in 96kHz, 24bit resolution, and Apple formats, including Apple lossless. No other device available today can read all of these formats. On top of that the Squeezebox doesn't limit fidelity to 48kHz, 16 bit decoding, like Apple's offerings, e.g. Airport Express. With the iPeng iPhone app for remote control (similar to Apple's new AirPlay technology), I have the convenience of using my phone to control music playback anywhere I want. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Online Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously sad that this product has been discontinued, because it is awesome! I am glad it's still functioning, despite being discontinued. My only complaint is that the squeezebox server seems to go down pretty often, which leaves me without access to any of the internet radio stations or apps.
customer_reviews.author: Traci D. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this when it was in the $200 range.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it is now selling for over $600. I was going to purchase a second, but not at this price. It works great for streaming Pandora, but it sometimes re-sets and you have to go through the whole set up process. I like the small profile.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, a classic
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware, flexible software, and a community of active users that has provided many custom solutions for audio delivery throughout the years. It's a pity that the whole concept has been discontinued instead of developed further.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device!!
customer_reviews.text: * Setup and installation was extremely easy. * Able to enjoy endless music genre's within minutes. * Easy interface with Bose Wave and Pandora, I-Tunes and endless radio stations. * Nice "extra" features such as view photos, Pod Casts, audio books etc. * Great job Logitech!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Wireless music from my computer to my quality sound system
customer_reviews.text: At last my huge music store can be played with digital quality through my quality sound system without needing wires. Big deal after much frustration with other attempts. Disappointing when I try to stream music from the Internet as my tethered cell phone connection lacks the band width. Oh well. Tedious making playlists with the Touch until I figured out I could make playlists easily in Windows Media Player and then save the playlist in the format needed for the Touch through a drop-down choice in the save playlist control of Media Player.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: why are you discontinuing this??
customer_reviews.text: I found out the beauty of the Squeezebox touch AFTER it is being discontinued by Logitech, regret so much, it is an easy to use music streamer and it connects with my "network-less" stereo very well!. Setup was easy. I use it everyday now. Grab it while you still can
customer_reviews.author: Millie M Ho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the best streamer ever. Too bad Logitech didn't keep this product line alive.
customer_reviews.author: mhamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: Heading says it all. It works, and with the addition of several 3rd party addons, I have complete customised drilldown access to my classical collection stored on a networked hard disk. Sound quality is outstanding (I use .flac files for all albums). Now keeping my fingers crossed that Logitech doesn't totally drop support.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The squeezebox touch is a really great product. It's very easy to set up and to use. It works flawlessly with the synology ds212j nas and flac files ripped with dbpoweramp. It streams the flac files perfectly from the wireless router, which is halfway across the house, and sounds great running through a good receiver and good set of speakers. The controller app works very well on my android tablet and on my android phone. After reading a lot of reviews I chose squeezebox over sonos and am very happy. I am about to buy a second touch and eventually will have four throughout my house.
customer_reviews.author: fafl

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate gadget
customer_reviews.text: It took some time for me to order the squeezebox due to the exchange rate of the euro, but a downfall helped that along. After receiving the package is was pretty easy to install, although the help of an expert was necessary to reinstall my router. The music quality is great, the options endless. I am one happy listener, the squeezebox having replaced the tv.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jonker

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea when it works
customer_reviews.text: When the Squeezebox works, it's great. The problem is any time I turn it on I may have to spend 10 minutes resetting it to factory defaults and then running through the first time setup to get it to work. Problems vary from merely displaying the wrong time to playing music, but not updating the display of the current song being played to not playing at all. I gave up on being able to play my own collection of music with Squeezebox Server. Connecting to the server to play my own music would generally trash my ability to play anything off the internet (Rhapsody, Pandora, or internet radio stations) until I reset the box.
customer_reviews.author: Henry May

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of the Squeezebox Touch throughout my house. They are great & easy to use. The free iphone app works very well too. I highly recommend it. I also have the Squeezebox Duet which does not work that well. Go with the Touch & you won`t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: boomquest

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised. Unfortunately a little pricey but easy to setup, navigate and compared to my Grace Internet radios comes with more listening options and picks up my local stations. I have it hooked up to quality speakers and the sound quality from the Internet stations is very nice and better then I have heard it anywhere else. Pandora is the only thing I have played on it where the sound quality is so so. I particularly like the ease of your favorites are one button away, easy to add and you can have favorites on the same screen to choose from the Internet radio and apps like Pandora stations, Tune In Radio and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Squeezebox as a gift for my Boyfriend , He's excellent with computers and electronics . All in all its a great item after you get it set up .The quality is excellent. If your not handy with electronics or computers you may need help setting up directions can be confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Why did Logitch cancel it?
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Using wireless and works great about 20 feet from an N base AP. The iPad app is great. As Stereophile said, "buy one today, you will never look back".
customer_reviews.author: honest review

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know any other product that delivers such a quality and functionality in one single inexpensive unit. It's a shame it was discontinued. All in all it's a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: João Otávio M. de A. Lins

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming music throughout the house.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my dad and he loves it, near CD quality sound (depends on file quality, we use flac) and sounds great over the stereo. Easy to control, and beats swapping out cds every time we want a change of music.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew MartinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Internet Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great internet radio. I have it hooked up to my Bose Wave Radio via the included aux audio cables. I was able to easily setup up Pandora, Last.FM and Sirius. This unit gets used daily and has performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Squeezebox
customer_reviews.text: Although tough to navigate to specific music likes and XM Radio. The signal is clear and the music full bodied. For an area where radio & TV signals are weak, I have excellent reception and sound. It was great to be able to pull the recordings from my computer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve of Brick

customer_reviews.title: Neat Wi-Fi Music Device
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertized. Relatively easy set-up. With a little extra effort can use to play MP3s stored on your computer through this device to your sound system. Even with your computer off the network this device can find various web sites that have sound content. Sometime after connecting, there has occurred a mismatch between another computer and my router on my LAN. I don't know if there is a relationship between events. Device is pricy,
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: What a great value in terms of price and sound and function ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame Logitech gave up on this product. What a great value in terms of price and sound and function options - whew!!!
customer_reviews.author: TMC Enterprises, Inc (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: A Terrific Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a one of a kind product. The sound quality is excellent. It gave a new lease of life to my 6 year old audio system and I am confident I can upgrade any time to a higher setup and this unit will not fail me. There are ways with which one can customize it for even better sound quality. An audiophile's dream come true. Why logitech discontinued it , is a mystery. Perhaps they have something up their sleeve which is even better.
customer_reviews.author: amitk777

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: FEDEX delivered it late yesterday afternoon and it was up and running in 30 minutes with wireless. I haven't tried the remote that came with it yet because I installed the IPENG app on my iPad the day before and have been using that remote software. I saw a few negative reviews for installation and set-up but didn't encounter one glitch. The sound is great from iTunes and Pandora.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and has sufficient power to drive my midrange Onkyo/Polk Audio home stereo system. I have it set up to pull music off a home server via wifi with no problems. It can also read off an SD card, which I use as a back-up. Best $200 I've spent in 2 or 3 years. Superior design, excellent workmanship, fun to use, sounds great. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Harro

customer_reviews.title: So sad it is gone....
customer_reviews.text: it is a real shame and it saddens me the fact that Logitech discontinued this awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit, sadly now discontinued
customer_reviews.text: This is my second SB Touch. The first one has been performing flawlessly and the build quality is great. It also sounds very good, the internal DACs do a pretty good job, using the standard analogue outputs is all you really need. Sadly Logitech has decided to call it quits for the Squeezebox range. Great pity. Grab one while they are still around.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Elan G! Home Control
customer_reviews.text: I installed this into a Elan G! system for that does total home control via ipad, touch screens, etc. This gave them the added option they wanted in listening to music on Pandora through their whole home audio. Easy install that was able to communicate with the home controller and display artwork etc! Definate must for anyone wanting to step up to the next level of home automation.
customer_reviews.author: Wibholm Electric

customer_reviews.title: The product turn out to be absolutely fine. Seller met or exceeded all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had an SB3 Claasic but needed tuo upgrade to a (used) Touch for hires streaming. The product turn out to be absolutely fine. Seller met or exceeded all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre I.

customer_reviews.title: Absolut Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have now the "Squeezebox" a few weeks, and recommend this item to everybody. Design is good, using is easy, Soundquality is absolutly great in this price range. I have also a professional "High End" WiFi Tuner in my house (USD 1700), and i verificate the soundquality of both items. The Logitech comes really very close to the 10 times more expensive professional Tuner.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have both Denon S52 and this Logitech. I am happy with Denon S52 with ease of use. But when I got my Logitech, I was amassed on how much easier and simpler than Denon Logitech was. I had this Logitech for only less than 1 month and I love it so much. The complaint I have is that occasionally it lost the wifi connection abruptly but once you connected again, there was no problem. And my wish that it can read folder by folder as well like Denon.
customer_reviews.author: hanliben

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Touch
customer_reviews.text: The Squeezebox Touch has performed as advertised in my audio system. It has worked flawlessly via the wireless router connected to our PC and produced excellent sound quality with 44.1/16, 44.1/24 and 96/24 audio files (the latter especially). The plethora of internet radio stations has also made my FM tuner unnecessary. An easy recommendation for converting a PC into a music server at a modest price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kovach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These work flawlessly. I just can't understand why they discontinued them. It's easiest way to get music from your computer to your stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Generally pleased with the operation of the unit but think operating procedures could be made more readily available & customer service easier to communicate with.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the older model and loved it. But this Squeezebox is so easy to use with the touchscreen and even better because it has a remote! I bought this for my fiancee and he is so glad he has it. Perfect gift for anyone who loves music or loves XM! :)
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and sounds great. The third-party iPeng app is a must have for the iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch users out there. It takes the controlling the squeezebox to another level. You will throw away the remote and forget the device even has a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gzar

customer_reviews.title: Let down by a slightly tedious UI and weak wireless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a my music player to hook up to my NAS and my hifi amplifier. Works a treat however there are several downsides most critically the user interface on the device is kind of clunky to use. Easily worked around by using the iPhone app however the more serious weakness is the fact that the wireless reception is slightly weak - it drops connections occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Squeezebox
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with my first one purchased used on Amazon and had to have another for the home office. Sure hope Logitech maintains support for them for a long time. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: 1dackel

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to stream from Time Capsule
customer_reviews.text: Item is awesome...just a shame i couldn't get it to work with my Apple Time Capsule. Apparently not the only one with this issue and Logitech could not resolve for me. Bottom line, if you stream via Time Capsule, BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: dukester

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product with ease of usage and quality of audio that suits the need of audiophiles. Its sad that logitech has discontinued this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeyaraj K

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and operation. It took less than 10 minutes and would have been quicker had we not incorrectly input the WEP code. Digital output signal is fine. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: flawless
customer_reviews.text: This unit delivers as advertised. Solid connection performance and astounding sound quality through my AVR. I would highly reccomend this add ion to anyones system. Provides for countless hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: audiodad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set up for 2 days and I'm already addicted. I have a huge mp3 collection and this gives me access and really great sound on the playback simply by plugging in a network cable and having my computer on. Meanwhile the internet radio stations and other apps are outstanding ways to discover new music. I am a novice when it comes to the audiophile thing but the DAC in this device is producing the best sound I've ever heard out of my stereo. Couldn't be more pleased so far and thought I should join the chorus of praise for this device.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Yriy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking solid made device with very very friendly setup procedure. Now you can listen almost every internet radio station and and your whole local music collection in your bedroom. pros - easy setup - wi-fi - good sound quality - digital outputs (coax,toslink) - usb, sd reader - web interface remote cons - no proxy support in initial setup - do not succeed to install Last.fm, Napster, Pandora applets (i'm from Russia)
customer_reviews.author: mastu

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Touch
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, easy to setup, and performs wonderfully. As the Logitech website indicates, it connects to your PC or gives a selection of internet radio options and outputs that to your home stereo. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Touch is a winner
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly simple way to stream your computer audio through your AV System. High quality internal DAC or feed a digital stream to your receiver. Setup is a breeze. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great new music source for office
customer_reviews.text: This device provides an unlimited variety of music with audiophile sound quality. It works well in my office and sounds fantastic. I highly recommend this product. Easy to set up and use. Pandora sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Long time I wanted to have a Squeezebox touch. Thanks amazon. Thanks USPS. Workmanship is very good, superior sound quality Will be very convenient to link NAS and network radio.
customer_reviews.author: BrainBUGsgeu

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Internet Radio Receiver!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Squeezebox Duet for a couple years, and it's been great. I had some wifi reception issues initially, but upgraded my router (sprung for an Airport Extreme - Wow!), and that problem was solved. Recently I decided to add a Squeezebox to my office, and chose the Touch, after reading several great reviews. Squeezebox does it again! Stupid-easy setup, easier to use than the Duet by a long shot, and great reception. I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You need to get this if you want to stream music! It works perfectly and sounds great. I may buy an external DAC to see if sound can be improved even more.
customer_reviews.author: mlski100

customer_reviews.title: Best music streamer there is
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best music streamer out there, in terms of audio quality, interface, and integration with music streaming services. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Squeezebox

customer_reviews.title: great squeezbox
customer_reviews.text: I like that i can use my harmony remote withe this product,very easy to set up.slim and compact, and i also like all the apps that i can download. thanks logtech
customer_reviews.author: manuel cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but little bit difficult to set up
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, however at the beginning to set up the system requires some work. After some failure I could set the equipment to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of raves about this, but the interface is actually quite clunky. You have to click through far too many menus to get where you want to go. The different apps are not well integrated together. In retrospect, I wish I had bought the Sonos system which has a far nicer user interface--much more Apple-like. The Sonos system is also expandable, which this is not. One other thing: the remote has these buttons, 1 through 10, that should let you push one and go to your favorite channel. But they don't work. In fact, they are useless. I don't understand how Logictech let such a glaring bug make it through the production process.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Sqeezebox Touch
customer_reviews.text: I have had difficulty downloading the Logitech media server and connecting to my USB library a 1 TB hard drive. Hopefully I will be able to resolve this issue. I just learned last night that the Sqeezebox series of products has been discontinued. I'm not sure what implication this has for current users.
customer_reviews.author: Mschenkel

customer_reviews.title: SEPT 2012: DISCONTINUED
customer_reviews.text: Squeezebox Touch has been discontinued by Logitech. Buyer beware that support and software upgrades for this product will likely cease to exist very shortly.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Phelan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great !!
customer_reviews.text: The Squeezebox Touch is an amazing value. I can't imagine anything else I could have purchased for $200 that has made such an impact in my system. Searching for a decent - good DAC next to bring the performance even better. A no brainer !
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: buggy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but buggy as hell. The unit freezes more than it should but when it works it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Pressureworld

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat device. I have had problems with Rhapsody working properly on it. I really don't use it much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: David Merrick

customer_reviews.title: squeezebox touch
customer_reviews.text: To be abble to hear music from around the world from my home stereo has long been a dream of mine. This devise is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: san anselmo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, very easy to use, good sound quality. I really recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lira Eyzaguirre

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Squeezebox Touch Review
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon deliver was perfect. The new Squeezebox Touch has a good finishment, a better sound, the the color screen is very good as we can see the information far from it and also can touch for commands. I would suggest an automatic dimmer (such as in the Squeezebox Radio) to reduce the screen light when not using it. Thanks, Décio
customer_reviews.author: Decio

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Squeezebox Touch to provide music selection for members at my gym. Love it!! It's pretty much amazing, sleek, beautiful, and perfect for what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Internet radio
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with what it does. Problems in saving favorite stations... some times the language tends to change
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Need more intuitiveness
customer_reviews.text: It will be a better product if the device can automatically switch to the next available library and support Chinese characters. The player is hot warm even when off.
customer_reviews.author: Wing

customer_reviews.title: Don't Get Ripped Off
customer_reviews.text: One star for Logitech discontinuing this once awesome product and to warn others not to pay the extremely high prices now being asked for a product that has already been buried. These prices that some people are paying affirm that those at Logitech behind the decision to cancel this line are just hacks. I bought a bunch used off Ebay for between 100-150 bucks. Product 5 stars Logitech 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Deep Thought

customer_reviews.title: Buggy! Is this the beta version?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the SBT a few months back and was curious how others rated it. I can't believe it has an average rating of 4.5. Positives: When it works it's a joy to have, excellent sound quality, bright display. Negatives: Very buggy! Freezes-up (must unplug), shows wrong song, comes on by itself, lousy touch-screen interface, doesn't let you choose "thumbs up", won't recognizing the flash drive much of the time...... Summing up, it's outrageously expensive for how it performs. Like buying a 40 grand automobile that breaks down three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: S. Day

customer_reviews.title: Mammas got a queezebox
customer_reviews.text: Has to be reset all the time. I cheaped out on this . It is OK not the best. For cheapos
customer_reviews.author: vernon

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Read the posts at logitech's own website. Squeezebox DOES NOT WORK WITH PANDORA and many other services such as Slacker. This is a known issue that logitech is unable to solve. I have spent good money for a useless paperweight. A special thanks to logitech for wasting my time, money and music experience. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
customer_reviews.author: gonzopa

customer_reviews.title: Passed its sell-by date
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, it was the way to stream your music across your home network. Now Apple devices will do that without the need to boot up a computer to run the Logitech Media Server. In its day this was a good device, but now it's time has passed.
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Paul

customer_reviews.title: Keep away
customer_reviews.text: Total Garbage, keeps shutting down. I have used this on many installs, it produce many problems for me and my customers
customer_reviews.author: Henryj

product_meta.title: Logitech Squeezebox Touch (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Logitech Squeezebox Touch. The color touch-screen Wi-Fi music player that lets you discover a world of music—all through your stereo.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


CES 2010 Innovations Award
Honoree in Audio Components CategoryNovember 2009LOGITECH SQUEEZEBOX TOUCH WI-FI MUSIC PLAYER
Put music as infinite as the Internet at your fingertips.
From the hottest online music services to free Internet radio stations from every corner of the globe, never has such limitless music been so easy to enjoy. Thanks to Logitech Squeezebox Touch and your Wi-Fi network, you're free to listen to anything you can think of, all through your home stereo. Just touch the screen to tune in to music, news and sports from local stations across the planet. Discover new music tailored to your tastes from a world of music services. Even your entire digital music collection is right at your fingertips. With Squeezebox Touch, your stereo isn't just a music system. It's the center of the music universe.

Tune in to your limitless playlist.

SqueezeBox Touch
Noteworthy Features

 * Play free local stations from every corner of the globe
 * Access music services like Pandora, Rhapsody, Slacker and SIRIUS Internet Radio
 * Browse your digital music collection stored on your home PC or Mac
 * Plug in your flash drive to instantly play your favorite tracks

enlargeNow playing on your home stereo—the world.
Your computer gives you access to virtually unlimited music choices from all around the world. Now your home stereo does, too. With Squeezebox Touch, your high-performance audio system can play anything your computer can in full, rich, room-filling sound, all streamed over your Wi-Fi or Ethernet network. What do you want to listen to? Live soccer coverage from a station in Barcelona? Your Gypsy Kings playlist stored on your computer down the hall? Hours of commercial-free classical radio? Browse and control it all with easy-to-use touch-screen menus. Just touch, explore and listen. It's that simple.

Brilliant full-color touch-screen and remote for fun, easy music control
The easy-to-read 4.3-inch touch-screen and intuitive menus put you in total music control. Simply touch “My Music”, “Internet Radio” or one of your favorite online services like Napster or Pandora to browse, select and play whatever suits your mood. Even album art is displayed so you can see what you want to hear. You also have a smart remote that actually knows where you are in the room. Move away from the touch-screen over to the couch, and the menus automatically enlarge for easy viewing from across the room. 

enlargeHigh-resolution encoding support for full, rich stereo sound
You like to hear it all, from the haunting high notes in a U2 guitar solo to the deep resonant bass at the bottom of a Miles Davis classic. With support for high-resolution encoding, Squeezebox Touch makes sure the important details in your digital music sources don't get lost in translation. Even if you're playing music softly in the background, you'll enjoy a high quality sound experience—without missing a beat, note or nuance.

enlargeAdd more Squeezebox players for a multi-room music system
Do you want to bring a world of music to other rooms—without running wires? Easy. Check out Squeezebox Radio and Squeezebox Boom all-in-one Wi-Fi music players with built-in speakers. They're small enough to fit easily on your bedroom night table or kitchen counter. And they work with your Squeezebox Touch. Simply add a handheld Squeezebox Controller and you can play the same music throughout the house, or mix it up with a different playlist in every room.

enlargeConnects to Facebook for sharing music recommendations with friends
Say you just discovered a killer indie band track on your Squeezebox Radio. Now you can tell your friends about it instantly. Display your Facebook home page and browse your friends' walls right on the screen. You can even set your Facebook photos or news feed as your screensaver. So you can send them music recommendations the moment you hear that amazing track or Internet radio station—and receive theirs, all without a computer.

enlargeSeamless home network support, effortless setup
Squeezebox Touch keeps things simple from the start. Just plug the music player into your audio system, turn on the power and the player automatically finds your home Wi-Fi network. You also have the option to plug in an Ethernet cable. Either way, in just five minutes you'll be listening to stations around the globe.enlargeUSB port and SD card slot expand your listening and viewing experience
Say you have a ton of favorite tracks stored on an external flash drive. Just plug the drive into the music player's USB port and your tunes are ready to play through your home stereo. You also have a built-in SD card slot. Just slide in your memory card to watch an instant slide show of your pictures, right on the touch-screen display.

enlargeFree SqueezeNetwork connects you to global stations and music services
Your Wi-Fi music player comes complete with the Logitech SqueezeNetwork, an online service that makes it easy to access all the Internet radio stations and music services you could ever want. Sign up for free and get connected right on your Squeezebox touch-screen.

COMPATIBILITY
WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * Logitech Squeezebox Touch
 * Power supply with plug adapters
 * Infrared remote control with batteries
 * Stereo audio cable
 * User documentation
 * Cleaning cloth
 * 2-year limited hardware warranty

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
For access to music on your computer use Squeezebox software with the minimum system requirements: * 256 MB RAM and 100 MB of available hard disk space
 * Broadband Internet connection required for Internet radio and music services
 * Stereo system or powered speakers
 * Ethernet or 802.11 b/g wireless home network

With any of the following operating systems: * Macintosh: Mac OS X 10.3 or later
 * Windows: 733MHz Pentium running Windows 2000, XP, or Vista
 * Linux/BSD/Solaris/Other: Perl 5.8.3 or later

COMPARE
WHICH SQUEEZEBOX WI-FI MUSIC PLAYER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? 

Squeezebox Radio 
Squeezebox TouchHighlightCompact design with high quality sound Color touch-screen with rich, full digital music through your stereo or powered speakersGreat for * Kitchen 
 * Bedroom 
 * Home office 
 * Patio 
 * Anywhere without a stereo!

 * Living room 
 * Anywhere with a stereo or powered speakers 
 * On your desk 

Which should you choose? * You want big sound in a small space. 
 * You are someone who likes to listen while you work. You need something to fit in your work area. 
 * You want music in every room of your home and you want to be able to control it from anywhere. 
 *  You already own a Squeezebox Duet and want to add more zones.

 * You are a music lover and you want high fidelity sound and easy access to all your music. 
 * You are someone who has a personal music collection on an external USB drive. 
 * You enjoy viewing album art, photos, and visualizers 
 * You already own a Squeezebox Duet and want to add more zones.

Connection Sound output Integrated speakers (no stereo required) Connects to your stereo or self powered speakersControl On board controls, optional infrared remote (line of sight required) Color touch screen with infrared remote (line of sight required)Special Features * Seven day alarm with battery backup 
 * Connect iPod and other portable music players via 3.5mm stereo jack 
 * Connects to Facebook- share recommendations with friends 
 * 2.4 inch color display 
 * Optional battery pack for portability

 * USB port and SD card slot allows access to music and pictures 
 * View album art and your photos 
 * Supports sampling rates up to 24 bit / 96 kHz
feature_bullets: Enjoy easy station and music control from anywhere in the room with a full-color touch screen, intuitive menus and remote
Experience full, rich sound supported by high-resolution encoding
Connect seamlessly to your home network through Wi-Fi or Ethernet, and also to connect to other Squeezebox players
Part number 930-000074 or 930-000090 may be shipped, as these are identical products
